name: Fratt goes to mart and gets lost (+16)
name_original: Fratt goes to mart and gets lost (+16)
description:
Fratt goes to mart and gets lost is an educational game in which you can improve your writing and writing speed. This is not a horror game. You will have to help Fratt escape the market by dodging the security guard.

It seems that the fridge is empty. You will have to go to the market to buy things that can be eaten. But when you arrived at the market you forgot everything you had to buy, so you will have to look for free Wi-Fi zones to communicate with your friend and he will tell you what you have to buy. Write down the 5 things to buy to win.

Controls:

WSAD - move

Left click - grab/interact

Rigth click - use

Mouse wheel - select

Shift - sprint
